TopicTitle: Issue with KSP Vessel Orbit Position

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I'm working on a KSP plugin extension for my KSPTOT application (see signature) and I've noticed that in many cases the position of other bodies in the game seem to be off from where I would have expected them using KSPTOT. They all seem to be off by roughly 90 degrees of true anomaly, or put another way, it looks like an X and Y coordinate are getting flipped on KSP's end.

Has anyone seen anything like this before?
